TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TypeDescriptionProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供補充性中繼資料給 。

span.span: Provides supplemental metadata to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會擴充以動態方式新增、 修改或隱藏特性，例如屬性、 屬性和事件類型或物件與相關聯的類型資訊。The class dynamically extends the type information associated with a type or object by adding, modifying, or hiding characteristics such as attributes, properties, and events. 可以有多個類型描述提供者的類別提供中繼資料至單一。There can be multiple type description provider classes that offer metadata to a single . 有兩種方法，使與:There are two ways to associate a with a : - 在設計階段，當目標類別可以指派適當標記。At design time, when the target class can be assigned the appropriate tag. - 在執行階段，當一的方法可以呼叫類別。At run time, when one of the methods of the class can be called. 這些多載的方法需要目標物件或其類別類型。These overloaded methods require either the target object or its class type. 類別必須仰賴屬於相同類型，在建構期間提供的父物件。The class relies on a parent object of the same type, supplied during construction. 這可讓類別衍生自選擇性地覆寫的方法。This allows classes that derive from to selectively override methods. 執行個體只建置在需求，自訂型別資訊，對效能的影響降到最低。Instances of are only built upon demand, minimizing the impact of custom type information on performance. 這個類別無法被繼承。This class cannot be inherited.

span.para: 您衍生的型別可能會標示為或，但您的型別執行個體可以建立與類別。請勿撰寫假設呼叫端不安全的程式碼受到信任。相反地，假設呼叫端可能會建立類型執行個體，在部分信任中。

Your derived type might be marked as or , but an instance of your type can be created with the class. Do not write insecure code by assuming the caller is trusted. Assume instead that callers might create instances of your type in partial trust.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式相當於呼叫其他建構函式的參數值與`null`。This constructor is equivalent to calling the other constructor with a parameter value that is `null`.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a parent type description provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parent`參數是`null`，則所有方法會傳回預設值。If the `parent` parameter is `null`, all methods will return default values. 否則，所有方法會將委派的方法`parent`。Otherwise, all methods will delegate to the methods of `parent`. 下表顯示的預設傳回值方法。The following table shows the default return values for methods. |方法Method|預設的傳回值Default return value| |------------|--------------------------| ||`null`| ||新建立的物件，用來呼叫方法。A newly created object through a call to the method.| ||預設執行個體類別。A default instance of a class.| ||預設執行個體類別。A default instance of a class.| ||`objectType`第一個參數。The `objectType` first parameter.|

summary.span: 建立可以代替另一種資料類型的物件。

span.span: Creates an object that can substitute for another data type.
The substitute .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定`provider`參數傳入方法類別。The specified by the `provider` parameter is passed in by the method of the class. 如果`provider`不`null`，以取得有關建立呼叫的其他內容類型描述提供者可以使用服務提供者。If `provider` is not `null`, the service provider can be used by the type description provider to obtain additional context about the creation call. 方法`virtual`，根據預設，會傳回的結果方法如果`provider`是`null`。The method is `virtual` and, by default, returns the result of the method if `provider` is `null`. 如果`provider`是`null`，這個方法會叫用父提供者的方法。If `provider` is `null`, this method will invoke the method of the parent provider.

span.para: 如果衍生的類別不想要提供替代的執行個體，它只應該呼叫基底實作。
If the derived class is not interested in providing a substitute instance, it should just call the base implementation.

param.span: 要為其取得快取的物件。

span.span: The object for which to get the cache.

summary.span: 取得個別物件的快取，以索引鍵/值組的 方式存取。

span.span: Gets a per-object cache, accessed as an of key/value pairs.

returns.span: 如果提供的物件支援快取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: An if the provided object supports caching; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可能需要執行複雜的作業，對中繼資料集合。A may need to perform complex operations on collections of metadata. 因為型別並未加入網域的存留期間卸載類別將會自動快取類型為根據這些作業的結果。Because types are not unloaded for the life of a domain, the class will automatically cache the results of these operations based on type. 不過，某些作業使用即時物件執行個體。However, some operations use live object instances. 這些作業就無法快取內類別，因為快取它們會防止物件被記憶體回收。These operations cannot be cached within the class because caching them would prevent the object from being garbage collected. 相反地，類別可讓每個物件的快取，以存取的物件上存在的索引鍵/值組。Instead, the class allows for a per-object cache, accessed as an of key/value pairs, to exist on an object. 方法會傳回此快取的執行個體。The method returns an instance of this cache. 方法會傳回`null`如果沒有任何支援的快取中的物件。The method will return `null` if there is no supported cache for an object. 預設值供會檢查物件是否實作站台的元件介面。The default used by examines the object to see if it is a sited component that implements the interface. 如果物件是，它會使用字典服務物件的快取儲存。If the object is, it uses the dictionary service to store the object's cache. 否則，該物件會傳回`null`。Otherwise, the object it returns `null`. 其他類型描述提供者可能會提供自己的實作。Other type description providers may provide their own implementation here. 例如，相依性物件可以只將附加型別的屬性。For example, dependency objects can just attach a property of type .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor GetExtendedTypeDescriptor (object instance);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor GetExtendedTypeDescriptor(object instance) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetExtendedTypeDescriptor (instance As Object) As ICustomTypeDescriptor
public: virtual System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor ^ GetExtendedTypeDescriptor(System::Object ^ instance);
abstract member GetExtendedTypeDescriptor : obj -> System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor override this.GetExtendedTypeDescriptor : obj -> System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor

param.name: instance
param.span: 要為其取得擴充型別描述項的物件。

span.span: The object for which to get the extended type descriptor.

summary.span: 取得特定物件的擴充自訂型別描述項。

span.span: Gets an extended custom type descriptor for the given object.

returns.span: ，可以提供物件的擴充中繼資料。

span.span: An that can provide extended metadata for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充的類型描述元是的提供內容的其他物件加入至這個物件，但不會實際物件定義的自訂類型描述元。An extended type descriptor is a custom type descriptor that offers properties that other objects have added to this object, but that are not actually defined on the object. 例如，在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]元件模型物件會實作介面可以將屬性附加至相同的邏輯容器中其他物件。For example, in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] component model, objects that implement the interface can attach properties to other objects that reside in the same logical container. 多載方法不會傳回型別描述項會提供這些額外的擴充屬性。The overloaded methods do not return a type descriptor that provides these extra extended properties. 方法會傳回這些延伸的屬性集。The method returns the set of these extended properties. 就會自動合併這些兩個屬性集合的結果。The will automatically merge the results of these two property collections. 雖然[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]元件模型支援擴充屬性，僅可用於擴充的屬性，以及事件，如果類型描述提供者支援它。While the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] component model supports only extended properties, can be used for extended attributes as well as events, if the type description provider supports it. 是`virtual`，根據預設，會傳回傳回空的結果，如果沒有父提供者傳遞自訂類型描述元。 is `virtual` and, by default, returns a custom type descriptor that returns empty results if no parent provider was passed. 如果父提供者已通過，則這個方法會叫用父提供者的方法。If a parent provider was passed, this method will invoke the parent provider's method.
